title: Add FLIF support
body: Add support for FLIF, the Free Lossless Image Format! Its benefits include progressive enhancement, transparency, and animations, all with significantly-fewer-bytes-received than other image formats! http://flif.info

comments.body: Yes! This would be an incredible advancement to responsive web design since files are progressively encoded. That way, browsers could load only the first part of a FLIF file until it reaches the size that the browser needs. I truly can't wait for a main-stream browser to support FLIF and if edge were first to support it, that would be remarkable!
